name: ext_R5_Contract_te_action
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Contract.term.action for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents Contract.term.action from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contract|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.
element.comment: `Contract.term.action` maps to R2 `Contract.term.action`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.

element.isModifierReason: If true this element negates the specified action. For Example, instead of a dictate to perform an action, it is a dictate not to perform the action.
